text: Bajram Rexhepi (3 June 1954 â€“ 21 August 2017) was a Kosovar politician. He was the former Interior Minister of the Republic of Kosovo and was member of the Kosovo Assembly. He was also the first elected post-war Prime Minister of Kosovo. He was a member of the second largest political party in Kosovo, the Democratic Party of Kosovo (PDK). ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Prime Ministers of Kosovo Category:Kosovo Albanians
title: Bajram Rexhepi
